content: Are you kidding me, XYZ? Last time your plumber left my place a mess and charged me way too much. Why should I even bother reaching out again?

I'm very sorry to hear about your previous experience. Your feedback is important to us and I'd like to help make things right. May I have your name so we can begin to address your current plumbing need?
It's Sam. I just want a straight answer and a fair price this time. And maybe don't send someone who can't clean up after themselves.
Thank you, Sam. We will do our best to ensure a better experience. Could you please provide your address so I can confirm if we're able to send a technician to your location?
408 Forest Lane. And before you say anything, I don't want surprise fees. How much is it to fix a leaky kitchen faucet?
Thanks for sharing your address and the issue, Sam. Iâ€™ll check if we can service 408 Forest Lane and also get you a price estimate for fixing a leaky kitchen faucet.

I apologize, Sam, but it appears that 408 Forest Lane is currently outside our service area, so we aren't able to send a technician to your address. If you have another location within our service zone in the future, please let us know. Sorry again for the inconvenience.
reason: Customer is out of service area.
